Questions.Question: What is the name of the dragon in 'The Dragon Prince'?
Questions.Explanation: 'The Dragon Prince' is a fantasy animated series created by Aaron Ehasz and Justin Richmond, and Zym is an important character in the show.

Questions.Question: Which magical land is the setting for 'Adventure Time'?
Questions.Explanation: The Land of Ooo is a post-apocalyptic setting where 'Adventure Time' takes place, filled with quirky, colorful characters and magical creatures.

Questions.Question: Who is the main antagonist in 'She-Ra and the Princesses of Power'?
Questions.Explanation: Hordak, a tyrannical leader, serves as the primary adversary to the protagonists in the popular fantasy cartoon series 'She-Ra and the Princesses of Power'.

Questions.Question: In 'The Last Airbender', which element does Aang struggle to master?
Questions.Explanation: Aang, the protagonist, initially faces difficulty in mastering Firebending, one of the four elements in the fictional world of 'Avatar: The Last Airbender'.

Questions.Question: What is the name of the magical school in 'The Owl House'?
Questions.Explanation: Hexside School of Magic and Demonics is the institution where the main character, Luz, studies and practices magic in the enchanting world of 'The Owl House'.
